blogPost.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
blogPost.body: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
blogPost.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money
blogPost.author: Rong Liew

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。

previous.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. ⠀ Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
previous.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps

localize.description: 利用Zoom业界领先的视频优先通信平台的性能、规模和可靠性，加速您的开发和构建完全可定制的基于视频的应用。⠀每月可免费使用10,000分钟会话。
localize.tagline: 构建完全可定制的基于视频的应用程序

localize.description: 利用Zoom業界領先的視頻優先通信平臺的性能、規模和可靠性，加速您的開發和構建完全可定製的基於視頻的應用。⠀每月可免費使用10,000分鐘會話。
localize.tagline: 構建完全可定製的基於視頻的應用程序

next.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
next.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth

localize.description: Take a Walk让您可以在世界各地进行虚拟散步，按国家、时间和天气进行筛选。欣赏世界各地的城市风光，聆听它们的声音，放松心情!
localize.tagline: 在地球上你最喜欢的地方放松

localize.description: Take a Walk讓您可以在世界各地進行虛擬散步，按國家、時間和天氣進行篩選。欣賞世界各地的城市風光，聆聽它們的聲音，放鬆心情!
localize.tagline: 在地球上你最喜歡的地方放鬆
